text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Good job, Mano.
You're getting better and better.

Howa...
Thank you very much...

The parts we talked about last time seem to have improved as well...
I think we're starting to see some results.

Yes...
but...
I still feel like I have a long way to go.

Since Producer-san went to the trouble
of arranging this opportunity for me...
I need to do better, more properly...
(...Maybe I'm pushing myself too hard.)

Mano,
First of all, thank you for taking this opportunity seriously.
Y-Yes...

But, you know, just because it's a different place doesn't
mean you have to think about things differentlyâ€”

It's okay to go at your own pace, Mano.
You don't have to rush.
Wha...?
...Was I being too hasty?

You seemed that way to me...
Sorry if I got the wrong idea.
No, that's not it at all.

I couldn't see it myself,
So I'm grateful you pointed it out.

I'm glad I got to talk to you, Producer-san...
Thank you.
